full_text:
BLOOD LEVELS OF NEUROLEPTIC DRUGS IN
NON-RESPONDING CHRONIC SCHIZOPHRENIC PATIENTS
Robert C. Smith, M.D., Ph.D.
H. Dekirmenjian, Ph.D.
John Crayton, M.D.
David Klass, M.D.
John M. Davis, M.D.
From the Texas Research Institute of Mental Sciences, Houston, Texas (Dr. Smith),
Manteno State Hospital, Manteno, I1linois (Drs. Smith, Crayton, and Klass), the
Illinois State Psychiatric Institute, Chicago, Illinois (Dr. Dekirmenjian, Crayton,
and Davis), and the Unviersity of Chicago, Department of Psychiatry (Drs. Crayton,
Dekirmenjian, and Davis).
Address for reprint requests: Behavioral Neurochemistry, Texas Research Institute
of Mental Sciences, 1300 Moursund, Texas Medical Center, Houston, Texas 77030 (Or.
Smith).
